${ModID}:NobleStrike.NAME: Noble Strike
${ModID}:NobleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage. Austerity: Gain 5 Gold and draw a card. Tribute 5: Draw an Attack.
${ModID}:NobleStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage. Austerity: Gain 5 Gold and draw !M! cards. Tribute 5: Draw !M! Attacks.

${ModID}:NobleStrikeAusterity.NAME: Austerity
${ModID}:NobleStrikeAusterity.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold and draw a card.

${ModID}:NobleSlash.NAME: Noble Slash
${ModID}:NobleSlash.DESCRIPTION: Discard one random card at the start of the next turn. Deal !D! damage..

${ModID}:WindShield.NAME: Wind Shield
${ModID}:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: Discard any amount of cards. Gain !B! Block for each discarded card.

${ModID}:Forcefield.NAME: Forcefield
${ModID}:Forcefield.DESCRIPTION: Discard one random card. Austerity: Gain 8 Temp HP. Tribute 8: Gain 16 Temp HP.

${ModID}:ThrowSoulstones.NAME: Throw Soulstones
${ModID}:ThrowSoulstones.DESCRIPTION: Austerity: Deal 5 damage. Tribute 10: deal 15 damage AND play this card again.

${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.NAME: Boundless Talent
${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.DESCRIPTION: Austerity: Gain 5 Gold. Tribute 5: Copy one card in your hand, it has Exhaust. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Willpower.NAME: Willpower
${ModID}:Willpower.DESCRIPTION: Austerity: Gain 1 Artifact. Tribute 10: Gain 1 Artifact and 1 Buffer.

${ModID}:MajesticBloodline.NAME: Majestic Bloodline
${ModID}:MajesticBloodline.DESCRIPTION: Austerity: Gain 1 Artifact. Tribute 10: Gain 1 Artifact and 1 Buffer.

${ModID}:MoreSupplies.NAME: More Supplies!
${ModID}:MoreSupplies.DESCRIPTION: Austerity: Gain a random Potion. Tribute 30: fill your Potion Belt with random Potions.

${ModID}:NobleForm.NAME: Noble Form
${ModID}:NobleForm.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, draw a card. When you lose Gold, gain 5 gold.
${ModID}:NobleForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you discard or play a card, draw a card. When you lose Gold or HP, gain 5 gold.
